metadata.title: CVE-2019-13670 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Insufficient data validation in JavaScript in Google Chrome prior to77.0.3865.75 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via a crafted HTML page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13670` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 77.0.3865.90-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 77.0.3865.90-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 77.0.3865.90-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 77.0.3865.90-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 77.0.3865.90-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '77.0.3865.90-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
